title: Ticket #6615: Accountant ads only sent to primary collector
description: When the negotiator sends the accoutanting ads to the collector for condor_userprio to inspect, it only sends them to the primary collector, not to all the collectors in a had setup.
remarks:
2018-Apr-23 15:53:07 by tannenba:
Note that previous to this patch, during each negotiator cycle the negotiator would create and subsequently close a new TCP connection to the collector to send the accounting ads. This resulted in a harmless, but misleading, error message to appear in the CollectorLog at each negotiation cycle that looked like: 

   04/23/18 18:11:44  DaemonCore: Can't receive command request from 150.xxx.xxx.xxx (perhaps a timeout?)

This patch re-uses the negotiator's existing connection to the collector, thus getting rid of that annoying collector error message.
